name: fRaNk (Ohhm)
description:
keys: movement- wasd , gun fire-left click + hold, jump-space, camera- mouse movement 

Have you ever felt as though you belonged in a community, only to find out that was not the place for you? You play as Frank, a chicken who hates other chickens. Always wanting to be more than just a chicken in the eyes of his turkey brethren, Frank turned to science. Frank learns that his turkey "family" will be cooked and eaten on Thanksgiving day.  Powerless to stop it, Frank builds a ray to revive the turkeys in hopes of creating a rebellion to stop the farmers from ingesting his kin. Collect the keys to open doors around the farm, revive Frank's "family" and drive off into the sunset...or away from the truth of who you are. 

First collect the "revivify ray" located directly outside of the chicken coop. Collect the keys hidden around the farm (one cranberry, one lemon, and one sugar), revive five turkeys and flock to the truck to complete your mission and find inner peace!
